title: Quesion on 2016 new Champ Select
body: Does the new 2016 champ select only mean you can choose champs that play in that lane. For example if i got support can I only play support champs or can I play any champ?

replies.body: They will never enforce a meta. Saying that, from that pic, it looks like nothing more than a positional indicator. Whose to say you won't solo teemo bot?
Just wondering since I main {{champion:27}} Support
Lol. How does that go against alistar/Leona/taric?
When that happens i mainly aim the adcs, or the support if they are low :). I usually end up carrying

> [{quoted}](name=GCSBBlitzForever,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=dqE2XVo4,comment-id=,timestamp=2015-11-04T01:16:20.479+0000)
>
> Does the new 2016 champ select only mean you can choose champs that play in that lane. For example if i got support can I only play support champs or can I play any champ?

No. You could choose Support and play Yasuo (Just an example), you still have free will, just not common sense.
